title: Master star broadcast seed initialized
summary: Bootstrapped constellation broadcasting: schema, nightly pulse, and Signal renderer.

payload.notes: This is the top-level aggregator in The Barycenter. Nightly pulse pulls latest.json from each star.

title: The story of Chloe begins â€” AI advisor awakens

payload.excerpt: The dawn crept thinly through warped shuttersâ€¦ At seven, Chloe already knew the world might reveal itself if she remained still long enough.
payload.notes: Chloe personifies the suite itself â€” the AI advisor guiding FourTwenty Analytics across its constellation.

title: Genesis Machine concept initiated
summary: A private development paradigm, the Genesis Machine begins rebuilding FourTwenty Analytics from the ground up using Colab and Polyglot notebooks with a Git repo. This process starts from scratch deliberately and methodically, creating a stable foundation without disrupting the living ecosystem.

payload.notes: Genesis Machine runs parallel to the Living Ecosystem. It recreates FourTwenty Analytics from 'the big bang' in a private, methodical environment. Promotions into the constellation occur only after validation.

title: Genesis Machine polyglot notebook initiated
summary: This polyglot workbook with VS Code capabilities opens up a whole new world of programming language for FourTwenty Analytics. This enables the genesis machine to be able build FourTwenty Analytics, literally, from the ground up in code.

payload.notes: FourTwenty Analytics started with a blank polyglot workbook.
